GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1539-S:
Reduces possible screen tearing by syncing the game with your monitor's refresh rate.

MAY SLIGHTLY INCREASE INPUT DELAY!
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1541-S: The key to open either the light or darkworld MENU.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1565-S: Adjusts/Disables some effects and other performance heavy audio filters.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1567-S: Disables the typing effect in most textboxes.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1598-S: Toggle between whether the game window takes up your entire monitor or not
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1614-S: The key to SPRINT. Will make you walk instead if Auto Run is enabled.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1656-S: Disables most unique fonts from specific characters, for example Sans and Papyrus's fonts.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1667-S:
Switch most text to the OpenDyslexic font for improved readability.

(There may be occasional weird text wrapping)
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1705-S: Adjusts visual effects to improve performance and reduce intensity.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1712-S: Automatically makes you sprint, the sprint key will make you walk instead.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1714-S: The key to CANCEL, for example finishing a line of dialogue.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level0-1775-S: The key to CONFIRM action, for example interacting with a sign.
GonerMenu_Settings_Element-level2-1812-S:
Switch most in-game text to the OpenDyslexic font for improved readability.
(There may be occasional weird text wrapping)
